OOC: Galvatron will be mentioned in this post. This is my long deseaced 
Galvatron, not Kinger's.

:::Cyclonus/Scourge:::

::At the ruined Neocon base in Syria, a bolt of energy surges. A body that 
had been dead for a very long time started to stir::
Cyclonus: Where am i?
::He looks around and sees the destroyed forms of Autojetter and Leozak. Then 
he realized that he was in his old base. Memories started returning to him. 
he remembered being a loyal Neocon under Galvatron's command. He also 
remembered Galvatrons death by Deathsaurus and his own. Now that the Neocons 
were gone, he wondered what he would do next. Suddenly, a stasis pod crashed 
into the ruined base. It opened up to reveal a familiar looking bot::
Scourge: Ughh, what happened? Cyclonus?
Cyclonus: yes, it is me, my old comrade. it seems we have the same problem.
Scourge: Yes, we have been dead for a long time, but we are back, and should 
find some other Decepticons.
Cyclonus: Exactly.
::They transform to their vehicle modes and fly in search of Decepticons::

--part1_3d.7fa17b4.27cc7280_boundary
